var.name: rain_bucket
var.description: Rain bucket that is reset at config_bucket_precip_interval

var.name: conv_bucket
var.description: Convective rain bucket that is reset at config_bucket_precip_interval

var.name: snow_bucket
var.description: Snow bucket that is reset at config_bucket_precip_interval

var.name: zrain_bucket
var.description: Freezing rain bucket that is reset at config_bucket_precip_interval

var.name: snow_total
var.description: Snow total using kuchera, cobb, gottlieb or static ratio schemes
